Flow.description: WG - Error FIX, Updated Pending Submission screen (Default Outcome) to use a new Pending_Required_Submissions boolean value. If outstanding submission(s) (Yes) are uploaded, then update the application or permit to Documents Received - Updating for new re-review process

formulas.name: OutstandingSubmissionsTextFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Pending_Submissions_Boolean} = True, "You have outstanding submissions. Navigate to the Submissions tab to upload required documents." , " ")

Flow.label: Upload Submission Requests

recordLookups.name: Get_Fees
recordLookups.label: Get Fees
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7)

recordLookups.name: Get_Pending_Submissions
recordLookups.label: Get Pending Submissions
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5 AND 8 AND 9) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6 AND 9) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7 AND 9)

recordLookups.description: Most records should move to a status of Completed while in the Application phase if all required submissions have been completed. This element checks if a Pending & Required submission exists on the Record. The next element determines if all required submissions have been uploaded.
recordLookups.name: Get_Updated_Submissions
recordLookups.label: Get Updated Submissions
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5 AND 8 AND 9) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6 AND 8) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7 AND 8)

screens.description: All submissions Complete - Fees Outstanding verbiage has visibility rule
screens.name: No_Pending_Submission_Requests
screens.label: No Pending Submission Requests

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_2a
fields.fieldText:
﻿Submission Requests


You have successfully uploaded documents to your pending submission request(s) for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.

fields.name: Outstanding_Fees_Text
fields.fieldText: You have outstanding fees for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. To pay for fees, click Pay Now or click Pay Later to be redirected to the record detail page and then click Pay Outstanding Items. Fees must be paid before the application will be deemed complete.

screens.name: No_Pending_Submission_Requests_And_No_Pending_Fees_Confirmation
screens.label: Pending Submission Requests Uploaded (all satisfied / no fees)

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_1
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests N/A


You have successfully uploaded documents to your pending submission request(s) for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.

screens.name: No_Pending_Submission_Requests_And_Pending_Fees_Confirmation
screens.label: Pending Submission Requests Uploaded (all satisfied / fees)

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_2
fields.fieldText:
﻿Submission Requests N/A


You have successfully uploaded documents to your pending submission request(s) for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.


You have outstanding fees for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. To pay for fees, click Pay Now below or on the Home page.

fields.name: No_Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests


You have no pending submission requests for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.

screens.description: Pending Submission Requests - Fees Outstanding verbiage has visibility rule
screens.name: Pending_Submission_Requests
screens.label: Pending Submission Requests

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_3a
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests


You have successfully uploaded documents to your pending submission request(s) for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.

fields.name: Outstanding_Submissions_Text_No_Fees
fields.fieldText: You still have required or conditional submission request(s) to complete. To complete those submission request(s) click the Previous button below; otherwise, click Finish to submit documents at a later date.

fields.name: Outstanding_Fees_Text2
fields.fieldText:
You still have required or conditional submission request(s) to complete. To complete those submission request(s) click the Previous button below; otherwise, click Pay Later to be redirected to the record detail page.


You have outstanding fees for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. To pay for fees, click Pay Now or click Pay Later to be redirected to the record detail page and then click Pay Outstanding Items. Fees must be paid before the application will be deemed complete.

screens.name: Pending_Submission_Requests_And_No_Pending_Fees_Confirmation
screens.label: Pending Submission Requests Uploaded (some satisfied / no fees)

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_3
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests N/A


You have successfully uploaded documents to your pending submission request(s) for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}.


You still have required submission request(s) to complete. To complete those submission request(s) click the “Previous” button below; otherwise, click “Save and Resume Later” to submit documents at a later date.

screens.name: Pending_Submission_Requests_And_Pending_Fees_Confirmation
screens.label: Pending Submission Requests Uploaded (some satisfied / fees)

fields.name: Confirmation_Page_4
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests N/A


You still have required submission request(s) to complete. To complete those submission request(s) click the “Previous” button below; otherwise, click “Finish” to submit documents at a later date. 


You have outstanding fees for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. To pay for fees, click Pay Now below or on the Home page.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Submission Requests

fields.name: Owners_Consent_Form_instructions
fields.fieldText:
Requirements for your Owner's Consent form are as follows:

Please download, fill out, and notarize the Owner's Consent Form from https://www.townofclaytonnc.org/ownersconsent

fields.name: Buffer_Determination_Letter_Requirements
fields.fieldText:
﻿Requirements for your Buffer Determination Letter are as follows:

Please click the link below for more information regarding buffer determination requirements

https://www.deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/water-resources/permitting/401-buffer-permitting-branch/riparian-buffer-protection-program

fields.name: General_Instructions_Submissions
fields.fieldText: Upload your required documentation to the submission request(s) below for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. Ensure that each document is no larger than 1GB in size. You may upload multiple documents to each submission request.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Major_Subdivision_Plan_Set_List
fields.fieldText:
The plan set must include the following:

  1. Cover Sheet
  2. Existing Conditions Sheet
  3. Signed & Sealed Boundary Survey
  4. Site Plan Sheet
  5. Phasing Plan Sheet
  6. Preliminary Engineering Plan Set
  7. Preliminary Grading Plan Sheet
  8. Landscaping Sheet
  9. Architectural Elevation Sheet
  10. Lighting Plan Sheet

fields.name: Conservation_Subdivision_Plan_Set
fields.fieldText:
The Conservation and Development Plan set must include the following:

  1. Cover Sheet
  2. Existing Conditions Sheet
  3. Signed & Sealed Boundary Survey
  4. Site Analysis Map
  5. Phasing Plan Sheet
  6. Lot Lines of Proposed Development Areas Sheet
  7. Other Development Features & Buffers Sheet
  8. Conservation Subdivision Sheet - Depicting Conservation and Development Areas
  9. Landscaping Sheet
  10. Preliminary Engineering/Utilities Sheet (Optional)
  11. Preliminary Grading Plan Sheet (Optional)
  12. Street Sheets (Optional)

fields.name: Text_Mylar_Response_Recorded
fields.fieldText: Your response has been recorded.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests


Upload your required documentation to the submission request(s) below for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. Ensure that each document is no larger than 1GB in size. You may upload multiple documents to each submission request.

fields.name: Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Submission Requests


Upload your required documentation to the submission request(s) below for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}. Ensure that each document is no larger than 1GB in size. You may upload multiple documents to each submission request.

  1. Cover Sheet

  4. Site Plan Sheet
  5. Phasing Plan Sheet

The plan set must include the following:

  1. Cover Sheet

  3. Signed & Sealed Boundary Survey
  4. Site Analysis Map

fields.name: Method_Mylar_will_be_Sent
fields.fieldText: Method Mylar will be Sent

fields.name: Display_Text_In_Person_Mylar
fields.fieldText: Please click next to record your response before bringing your mylar in...NEED VERBIAGE FROM THE TOWN

fields.name: Update_Fault_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong with this flow.


Contact us and include any error messages you see.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
